tweet: Due to their work, Veterans Eugene Gorski, John McClintock,  Jack Foust, and Leo Murphy will lay along side their fellow heroes at our national veterans cemetery. Thanks to the Joseph A. Pure heroism by @PhillyPolice during this tragic incident. We are monitoring this active shooter situation with our law enforcement brothers and sisters in Philadelphia.
